modName: Drafkaa s Tower Revamp - Dawnguard Dragonborn
summary:
A player home, only acces is by a spell you will find somewhere in the college of winterhold (location may change in the future).
====================================
Magicly themed player home filled with features and clutter.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#632423][b]Drafkaa's Tower[/b][/color][/font][/size]
[size=3]This old magical Tower was constructed by a powerfull mage. He died in a battle with savos aren, now the tower is yours to use. The needed stones for the new teleportation spell (crafteble at the forge) can be found in their holds. It will require some searching![/size]

[size=2]I am currently working on version 3 of this mod. It will take some time tough since i am planning on adding a simple quest line too.
The things you can expect in version 3 are:
*A new area called The magical Vault
*A completed Journal
*A more detailed and expended Follower wing
*A Main but simple quest line[/size]

[size=1]p.s. the lightning in the screenshots might be diffrent than yours. Screenshots are always welcome[/size]
[font=Arial]------ --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/font]
[size=4][color=#e36c09][font=Arial Black]Features:[/font][/color][/size]
[font=Book Antiqua][size=3][color=#002060]*[/color]alchemy station
[color=#002060]*[/color]enchanting table
[color=#002060]*[/color]bookshelfs to store the books you find on your adventures to read later
[color=#002060]*[/color]custom storage containers in the library
[color=#002060]*[/color]a bedroom with mannequins to store your outfits
[color=#002060]*[/color]4 weaponracks
[color=#002060]*[/color]follower friendly.
[color=#002060]*[/color]Custom crafting station
[color=#002060]*[/color]Teleport spells[/size][/font]

[font=Arial]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/font]

[color=#e36c09][font=Arial Black][size=4]Future plans:[/size][/font][/color]
[font=Book Antiqua][size=3]*Finish Drafkaa's journal
*Exspend the follower wing
*Add detailed clutter to follower wing[/size][/font]
---------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Arial Black][size=4][color=#e36c09]History:[/color][/size][/font]

[color=#00b050][b]Version 02.70[/b][/color]
[font=Arial Narrow][size=3]*Added a new teleportation spell
*Continued the journal
*Added 2 new follower rooms (Solitude and windhelm housecarls)
*Fixed the improving crafting option
*Added a button in the main hall
*Fixed a navmesh collision
*Revamped the main bedroom[/size][/font]

[color=#00b050][b]Version 02.60[/b][/color]
[size=3]*Revamped the crafting area.
*Added founding work for future features.
*Some minor container fixes.[/size]

[b][color=#00b050]Version 02.50[/color][/b]
[font=Arial Narrow][size=3]*Added 3 rooms in the follower wing for the college followers.
*Written the very beginning of Drafkaa's Journal.[/size][/font]

[color=#00b050][b]Version 02.00[/b][/color]
[font=Arial Narrow][size=3]*New Teleportation spell
*Smithing Area Added
*Added The Garden
*A few small fixes like collision and navmesh[/size][/font]

[color=#00b050][b]Version 01.20[/b][/color]
[font=Arial Narrow][size=3]*fixed the spell visuals
*added collision boxes to the statues
*fixed a navmesh problem that rarely occured.[/size][/font]

[color=#00b050][b]Version 01.10[/b][/color]
[font=Arial Narrow][size=3]*added Features to the hall of magic
*Made the Library a bit brighter
*Darkened the hall of magic
*Added collision boxes to the statues
*Fixed some shadow striping[/size][/font]

[font=Arial]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/font]
